item.title: The US labour share of income: What shocks matter?
First Post
item.description:
A post.

ggplotly(g)

item.title: Technical progress in GDP production and $CO_2$ emissions in Brazil: 1970--2012

Exports evolution in the Southern region and in the Brazilian economy over the 2000s: Competitiveness and technological profile [In Portuguese: Evolução das Exportações da Região Sul e do Brasil nos Anos 2000: Competitividade e perfil tecnológico]
Hi there
item.description:
Hi, I’m Alison Hill!

Find me at…

apreshill
apreshill
alison.rbind.io
alison@rstudio.com
